Alvin.title: Alvin
Alvin.byline: Alvin is in the Gulf Coast of Texas.

Alvor.title: Alvor
Alvor.byline: Alvor is a town and freguesia (civil parish) in Portimão, in the southern Algarve region of Portugal.

Alvito.title: Alvito
Alvito.byline: Alvito is a town and municipality in Baixo Alentejo, Portugal.
